translations: v.俯身，弯腰；（站立或行走时）弓背，驼背；卑鄙，堕落；（猛禽）下扑，猛扑
n.驼背，弯腰曲背；<美>门廊，门阶；（猛禽的）下扑，猛扑

sentences.sentence: I didn't think he'd stoop to cheating.
sentences.translation: 我觉得他总不至于说谎吧。

sentences.sentence: They will stoop to every lowdown trick.
sentences.translation: 他们什么卑劣的手段都使得出来。

sentences.sentence: He tends to stoop because he's so tall.
sentences.translation: 他个子太高了，所以时常弓着背。
